focusKey.description: Key to focus the chat's input field.

hideOnConnect.description: Hides the chat on player connect.

maxCommandSuggestions.description: Maximum number of command suggestions that are displayed in the chat.

maxMessageBufferLength.description: Maximum number of messages in the buffer that can be used to pick a previously entered message with the up/down arrow keys.

maxMessageHistory.description: Maximum number of messages in the history that are saved in the local storage.

maxMessageLength.description: Maximum number of characters in a message.

maxMessages.description: Maximum number of messages that can be displayed at the same time.

muteMessage.description: Message that is displayed when a player is muted.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text in the input field.

scrollStep.description: Number of pixels to scroll when using the mouse wheel or page up/down keys.

unfocusKey.description: Key to unfocus the chat's input field.

unknownCommandMessage.description: Message that is displayed when a player enters an unknown command.

useChatFormattingInAPI.description: Enables chat formatting in the API.
